data.actual_result: It treats it as a image. So when you open the image, safari opens, with a different CDN URL. Latest tesflight
data.expected_result: Safari opens the attachment (it does), and allows you to download it
data.short_description: iOS app doesn't allow you to download attachments
data.steps_to_repro: - Have someone send you a file on mobile, such as a .txt - try and open it
